name: Dominosa
description:
If you like logical brain teasers and board games like Sudoku and Mahjong, Dominosa is for you! The exciting mix of dominoes and puzzles! Challenge your brain and logic skills in this board puzzle game with domino tiles.

With a beautiful artwork, comprehensive interface, simple rules and challenging levels, Dominosa is sure to keep you entertained for hours. And the best of all, it’s free!

HOW TO PLAY
It’s simple! Each domino consists of a pair of numbers. Find the correct spot for all domino pieces on the grid. Watch out because you can have only one of each pair.

Play now the most simple, user friendly and best designed Dominosa app available for mobile devices. You won’t regret this experience!
